original_text: But even after that we had suffered before, and were shamefully entreated, as ye know, at Philippi, we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention.
korean_text: 너희가 아는 바와 같이 우리가 먼저 빌립보에서 고난과 능욕을 당하였으나 우리 하나님을 힘입어 많은 싸움 중에 하나님의 복음을 너희에게 전하였노라

sentences.original_text: But even after that we had suffered before
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 우리가 이전에 고난을 받았음에도 불구하고

sentences.original_text: we were bold in our God
to speak unto you gospel of God
